title: Your shop messed up? @Riot
body: I opened my shop on a few accounts of mine but I keep getting skins that are 975, but I get 1950 original price with a reduced 30% of for 1264 and also goes for 1350 skins being 2230 Rp,

replies.body:
Hey! 

If you don't own the champion, the shop will show both the price of the champion, as well as the price of the discounted skin. If you purchase the champion separately with IP / RP, the shop will then show the price of the discounted skin only.
